questions.question: A 6-year-old boy presents with lower abdominal pain and diarrhea. The stool examination finding is shown below. Which of the following is most likely causative organism?
questions.explanation: Correct Answer C - Entamoeba histolytica Explanation: The given image is of E. histolytica trophozoites. Entamoeba histolytica is the causative organism of amoebic dysentery , which can present with symptoms such as abdominal pain , diarrhea , and sometimes bloody stools . In the case of a child presenting with lower abdominal pain and diarrhea , Entamoeba histolytica should be strongly considered, especially when stool
